name: Thy Mension
description:
Thy Mension is the game I made for the BlackThornProd Game Jam. It is a very simplistic 2D/3D game where you control both the 2D and 3D caharcters at once. I thought this idea was really cool so I hope you enjoy it.

Controls:

2D character:

 A, D or arrow keys to move left and right.

Space Bar to jump and twice to double jump.

Wall climbing/ sliding is available.

3D character:

W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move.

I hope you like it!
